Package photos.Entities

Class Photo

java.lang.Object
photos.Entities.Photo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Photo extends Object implements Serializable
Class that is responsible for the information and behaviors associated with a photo.
Author:
Prajit Kundu, Howard Luo
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private String
    caption
    String that represents the given caption of the photo.
    private Date
    date
    Date that represents the date that the photo was "captured"
    private String
    dateTime
    String that represents the date and time that the photo was "captured" (actually the time the photo file was last modified) in format "YYYY/MM/DD HH:MM:SS".
    private String
    name
    String that represents the given name of the photo.
    private int
    numAlbumsContaining
    Integer that represents the number of albums that the photo is in.
    private ArrayList<Tag>
    tags
    ArrayList of Tags that holds the tags associated with the photo.

    Constructor
    Description
    Photo(String name)
    Constructor that creates a photo with the given name and sets its date and time of "capture".

  • Field Details

    • name

      private String name
      String that represents the given name of the photo. The name is the pathname of the corresponding photo file.

    • tags

      private ArrayList<Tag> tags
      ArrayList of Tags that holds the tags associated with the photo.

    • dateTime

      private String dateTime
      String that represents the date and time that the photo was "captured" (actually the time the photo file was last modified) in format "YYYY/MM/DD HH:MM:SS".

    • date

      private Date date
      Date that represents the date that the photo was "captured"

    • caption

      private String caption
      String that represents the given caption of the photo.

    • numAlbumsContaining

      private int numAlbumsContaining
      Integer that represents the number of albums that the photo is in.

  • Constructor Details

    • Photo

      public Photo(String name)
      Constructor that creates a photo with the given name and sets its date and time of "capture".
      Parameters:
      name - the specified name of the photo to be created

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      This method returns the name of the photo.
      Returns:
      value of name

    • getTags

      public ArrayList<Tag> getTags()
      This method returns the tags of the photo.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Tags
      See Also:
      • Tag

    • getCaption

      public String getCaption()
      This method returns the caption of the photo.
      Returns:
      value of caption

    • getUnformattedDate

      public Date getUnformattedDate()
      This method returns the date and time of "capture" of the photo.
      Returns:
      value of date

    • getDate

      public String getDate()
      This method returns the date of "capture" of the photo.
      Returns:
      value of dateTime in format "YYYY/MM/DD"

    • getTime

      public String getTime()
      This method returns the time of "capture" of the photo.
      Returns:
      value of dateTime in format "HH:MM:SS"

    • getNumAlbumsContaining

      public int getNumAlbumsContaining()
      This method returns the number of albums that this photo is in.
      Returns:
      value of numAlbumsContainin

    • addTag

      public void addTag(Tag tag)
      This method adds a tag to the photo.
      See Also:
      • Tag

    • deleteTag

      public void deleteTag(Tag tag)
      This method removes a tag from the photo.
      See Also:
      • Tag

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      This method changes the name of the photo.
      Parameters:
      name - the desired name of the photo

    • setCaption

      public void setCaption(String caption)
      This method changes the caption of the photo.
      Parameters:
      name - the desired caption of the photo

    • changeNumAlbumsContaining

      public void changeNumAlbumsContaining(int i)
      This method changes the number of albums that this photo is in.
      Parameters:
      i - 1 or -1, signifying adding the photo to an album or deleting a photo from an album

    • tagIndex

      public int tagIndex(String tagType, String tagName)
      This method returns the index of specified Tag in tags.
      Parameters:
      tagType - the type of the specified tag
      tagName - the name of the specified tag
      Returns:
      the index if the tag was found, -1 if the photo does not have the specified tag
